info.title: PocStore
info.description:
The PocStore offer two functionalities:
1. Defines a database schema by declaring its containers, commands and messages
2. Is a database client providing type-safe access to its containers, commands and messages
Generated by JSON Fliox

post.summary: Create the given number of sync requests each with an upsert to articles
Echos the given parameter to assure the database is working appropriately.
A command that completes after a specified number of milliseconds.
List all database containers
List all database commands and messages
Return the Schema assigned to the database
Return the number of entities of all containers (or the given container) of the database
Starts a transaction containing all subsequent SyncTask's
Commit a transaction started previously with TransactionBegin
Rollback a transaction started previously with TransactionBegin
Returns general information about the Hub like version, host, project and environment name
List all databases and their containers hosted by the Hub
Return the groups of the current user. Optionally change the groups of the current user
Return client specific infos and adjust general client behavior like queueEvents

get.summary: return / filter multiple records from container orders
get.description: To process big result sets fetch them iteratively by setting **maxCount** of records per request and use the returned **cursor** on the subsequent request.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: filter returned records by applying a expression predicate. E.g. `o.name == 'Peter'`

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: limit the number of returned records

parameters.name: maxCount
parameters.description: maximum number of records. Result will return a **cursor** if more records available.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: pass the **cursor** returned by the previous request

put.summary: create or update multiple records in container orders

get.summary: get a single record from container orders

put.summary: write a single record to container orders

patch.summary: patch a single record in container orders

delete.summary: delete a single record in container orders by id

post.summary: get multiple records by id from container orders
delete multiple records by id in container orders
